event.title: European SFS Award 2024 in Bolzano, Italy

body.p: The Free Software Foundation Europe (FSFE) and the Linux User Group Bozen-Bolzano-Bulsan (LUGBZ) jointly honour outstanding Free Software developers who have significantly advanced the spread and advocacy of Free Software across Europe.
The European SFS Award recognizes individuals who have made remarkable contributions to fostering a Free Software culture, and it is presented during the SFSCON conference.
